law.catch_line: In cooperation with the registers, the Attorney General shall:...

text.section:
In cooperation with the registers, the Attorney General shall:
Make available to the public basic instructional materials to assist the public in the procedure and preparation of forms for probate; and
Review the instructional materials on a regular basis and update them as necessary.

The registers and designated employees of the registers shall:
Provide the materials required under subsection (a) of this section to the public; and
Assist and advise any person who requests assistance or advice in the preparation of any forms for administrative probate under this article.
